adjective.description: Having or characterized by many transient sexual relationships.
examples: they ran wild, indulging in promiscuous sex and experimenting with drugs

adjective.description: Demonstrating or implying an undiscriminating or unselective approach; indiscriminate or casual.
examples: the city fathers were promiscuous with their honors

origin: Early 17th century: from Latin promiscuus indiscriminate, (based on miscere to mix) + -ous. The early sense was consisting of elements mixed together, giving rise to indiscriminate and undiscriminating, whence the notion of casual.
